price: Na ya kwamba mniabudu Mimi? Hii ndiyo Njia Iliyo Nyooka.
footnotes: Na nyinyi mniabudu Mimi peke yangu, kwani kuniabudu Mimi tu ndiyo Njia kuu katika kusimamisha Dini sawa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
